name: ultra-ball
effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 2×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 2×.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A better BALL with
a higher catch rate
than a GREAT BALL.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A better BALL with
a higher catch rate
than a GREAT BALL.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A very high-grade BALL that offers
a higher POKéMON catch rate than
a GREAT BALL.
